title: Transport Stocks Are Flashing Bullish Signals for Broader Market
sub_head: The Dow Jones Transportation Average, which tracks 20 companies ranging from UPS to Union Pacific, has jumped ahead of other market gauges
body:
Transportation stocks have been zipping higher, a sign of optimism about the economyâ€™s strength that could fuel a broader market rally.
Companies that operate trains, planes, boats and trucks tend to see their prospects brighten when a growing economy boosts demand for goods, materials and travel. For that reason, some investors look to the performance of transportation shares as an indicator that a robust commercial environment will underpin gains across industries.
